title: Windows 8.1 Pro X64 + Office15 SP1 ESD en-US by Generation 2-=TE
description:
[b]* Windows 8.1 Pro X64 + Office15 SP1 ESD en-US[/b]


[ RELEASE INFO ]

* File: W81.X64.Pro.Off15.en-US.Apr.2015.iso
 
* Sources: dvd 6050880 & X18-65215
 
* Size: 3,97GB
* Format: Bootable ISO
 
* CRC32: a4222ad0
* MD5:	 000a6069a3f961d60a01c51cd4809ec5
* SHA-1: e8d666f62091895b1ac47515a33fcea37a77aea6

[ LANGUAGES ]

* en-US [ English - US ] 

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Pro		

* Windows 8.1 Pro - - Office 2013 SP1 integrated

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* Office 2013 SP1 32bit
* Hotfixes - 2015-03-10

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890930
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.


[ Activation & application information ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

* Optional applications (except 7-Zip and WinRAR) use web installers

* that will install the latest available version for you.

* Web installers requires connection to internet.

* To activate, select "KMSpico".

* Choose any optional application(s).

* Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.

* To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".

* Activator: KMSpico v10.0.0.4
[b][ Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ][/b]

* To activate Office, use Microsoft Toolkit.
* [extract attached MTKV253.zip]

[ Optional software ]

* Browsers:
* Google Chrome
* Mozilla Firefox
* Opera Chromium

* Software:
* 7-zip 9.30
* Adobe Reader
* DirectX
* Flashplayer
* Notepad++
* WinRAR 5.21

* Media:
* GOM Player
* VLC Player
* Winamp


[b]* Hope you will enjoy this release![/b]

* Regards,
* Generation2
